name: Blacksmith Hero
description:
Blacksmith Hero, a low quality take on Guitar Hero

Goal: to make a game using only the scroll wheel.

For this game, I managed to take part in the whole design process, from the theme, the aesthetic, the dialog and even the recording of the metal hitting metal sounds. It was a very fun project to participate on for a GameJam. 

Controls

Menu: to move, use scroll wheel up, to select move scroll wheel down. 
Game: use scroll wheel to move the hammer up and down. 
Skip conversation: by scrolling up or down.

Assets: https://opengameart.org/content/24x32-peppercarrot-characters + the links in the source https://opengameart.org/content/heavy-iron-hammer
